CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 8, 1961, pg. 18, reads: "On TV Program - Mrs. Alma Illery, president and founder of the National Achievement Clubs Inc., poses with Mr. and Mrs. Gordon Irving, following their appearance on TV Channel 4. The trio participated in Easter inspirational program on TV Station WTAE. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alma Illery, Mrs. Irving, and Gordon Irving gathered around piano in WTAE television station studio
